text: Joseph Edmund "Joe" Morgan (7 August 1945 – 22 December 2002) was a New Zealand rugby union player. A second five-eighth, Morgan represented North Auckland at a provincial level, playing a record 165 matches for that union. He was a member of the New Zealand national side, the All Blacks, from 1974 to 1976, and appeared in 22 matches for the All Blacks including five internationals. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Rugby union players from Whangārei Category:New Zealand rugby union players Category:New Zealand international rugby union players Category:Northland Taniwha players Category:Rugby union centres Category:People educated at Whangarei Boys' High School
title: Joe Morgan (rugby union)
